name: 賴名亮
objective: In this class, we will introduce the examination practice for special patent cases, such as computer software, medicine, biology, and Chinese herbal medicine. In addition, the examination of utility model patent and patent invalidation will also be discussed.
schedule:
Week 1     Introduction
Week 2     Patent Examination Guidelines, section 2, chapter 12(I)
Week 3     Patent Examination Guidelines, section 2, chapter 12(II)
Week 4 　　 Patent Examination Guidelines, section 2, chapter 12(III)
Week 5     Patent Examination Guidelines, section 2, chapter 13(I)
Week 6     Patent Examination Guidelines, section 2, chapter 13(II)
Week 7　　 Patent Examination Guidelines, section 2, chapter 13(III)
Week 8     Patent Examination Guidelines, section 2, chapter 14(I)
Week 9     Patent Examination Guidelines, section 2, chapter 14(II)
Week 10　　 Patent Examination Guidelines, section 2, chapter 14(III)
Week 11   Patent Examination Guidelines, section 2, chapter 15(I)
Week 12   Patent Examination Guidelines, section 2, chapter 15(II)
Week 13   Patent Examination Guidelines, section 2, chapter 15(III)
Week 14   Patent Examination Guidelines, section 4, chapter 1
Week 15   Patent Examination Guidelines, section 4, chapter 2
Week 16　　 Patent Examination Guidelines, section 5, chapter 1
Week 17   Patent Examination Guidelines, section 5, chapter 2
Week 18　　 Term report
materials: Patent Examination Guidelines from TIPO (Taiwan Intellectual Property Office).

covid19.courseInfo: Other weeks online link, please refer to NTUT i-campus course notice board.
